snippet: Carlos Castro, who recently left a homeless shelter and has regained limited eyesight after being attacked and stabbed, is trying to land a full-time job and enroll in college.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York provides Carlos Castro, who was left with limited eyesight after a 2003 mugging, with funds to purchase a suitable work wardrobe.
lead_paragraph: Carlos Castro, who recently left a homeless shelter and has regained limited eyesight after being attacked and stabbed, is trying to land a full-time job and enroll in college.

headline.seo: Left Blind After a Mugging, a Son Is Still Driven to Support His Family
headline.main: Left Blind After a Mugging, a Son Is Still Driven to Support His Family
headline.print_headline: Left Blind After a Mugging, a Son Is Still Driven to Support His Family
